title: ALFURQAN COMPUTERS
detailsOfAchievement: Alfurqan Computers participate in different National Skill Development Training Programs. We had Already Take Part In National Digital Literacy Mission NDLM and now we also Working in PMGDISHA to train students. Alfurqan Computer Also Take Part in PMKVY and also working with PMKVY Part Two And also take major part in Rural Development Training Funded by ministry of urban Development To Train more then Three Hundred Students in Different Information Tech courses.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: National institute of electronics and information technology formerly DOEACC provided us to conducted the training program under the scheme of Rural Trainings sponsored by MINISTRY OF RURAL DEVELOPMENT for different courses. And ALFURQAN COMPUTERS successfully completed this project and train nearly about 200 student under this scheme. And many poor students get benefited and get trained and placed at different industries under this scheme.

URBAN DEVELOPMENT AGENCY KASHMIR SRINAGAR ACCORDED TO THE SPONSORSHIP OF 50 STUDENTS THREE MONTHS TALLY AND CCC COMPUTER COURSE . THE TRAINING PROGRAMME HAS TO BE CONDUCTED AT ALFURQAN COMPUTERS SUCCESSFULLY AND NUMBER OF STUDENT ARE ALSO PLACED AT DIFFERENT SECTORS.
THIS IS ONE YEAR DIPLOMA COURSE IN COMPUTER APPLICATION UNDER NIELIT WHICH IS FUNDED BY MINISTRY OF MINORITY FOR OBC AND OTHER BACKWARD STUDENTS.

THE PORJECT IS UNDER PROCESS AND WE ARE LEARNING 150 STUDENTS UNDER THE POST MATRIC SCHEME UNDER THE DEPARTMENT OF MINISTRY OF MINORITY AFFAIRS AND FUNDED BY CENTRAL GOVERNMENT FOR OBC AND OTHER BACKWARD CLASS STUDENTS.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: Ministry Of Electronics And Information Technology
